message.body: So it totally is because I'm going to be leaving that my mom won't talk wedding. I was talking about moving to dc and she was like "I only have two daughters..." And then she started crying :(
Im sorry, baby :-( I really feel guilty. I feel like i really messed up. Who knows what will happen tho. No job, and wedding would still be so far off.

Omg baby nooooo!!!! She knew that either way I'd be going to DC. She even said it a little bit ago! And she didn't like...break down crying, my love. She shed about 2 tears. Her main reason is because she wants grandkids. Haha.
It was overly sad and dramatic. I don't even think she realizes that I saw. We ended up talking about how our kids are probably going to be gorgeous!
Haha well i promise promise she'll see grandkids all the time. Probably 4 times more often than my parents. I do feel bad though. 2 tears or loads.
Oh well that's just not fair for your parents! My mama is just being over dramatic.
I dunno how they feel, but i can guess purty good. DCs a lot farther from wayne.
True. But if we can go to philly we can go to Wayne! Or just not tell my mama. Hehe
Haha naw. If we go all the way up, gotta stop at your house too! Cant drive right past it!
Ohhhh yes we can!
Muahahahahahaha! I got a 95 on my chem exam!
Hey baby. You okay? Make it home?
Hey darling :) Congrats on your test! Was gonna call ya. We arent home yet. But should be soon. Im good. Just resting.
Oh good!!! I'm glad. Get home soon soon and stay home!!
Haha i wish! But no such luck! You staying up for a little bit?
I think so. That nap made me a little less tired. Haha.
Oh good :) I guess i'll get home around 10:15 so i'll call you then :)
Ewwww. But okay! I'll be awake.
It'll be asap! Hope not that late
Haha. Okie dokie. I love you so much!
Love you too! Lotta lotta lot!
Just made it to Union. Hopping on metro in a few minutes.
Yay. Finally!!
Oyyy. My arms are sore from that bike. Haha. And my sister has the bug :(
No no no no no no baby. None of that is good. It's very very bad. Keep yo body and yo family healthy!
Haha. I know. I'm hoping that I won't get it before tomorrow. I need to get through my chem lab. After tomorrow, it can take me!
NO! NEVER!
I agree. I would prefer to NEVER have it!!!!! I want to disinfect everything. I literally opened a new toothpaste and have been disinfecting everything with Clorox before I touch it.
Haha good!! Dont get sick, my love. Not allowed!
:) I shall try. Though it will be difficult. My mama will most likely get it. Then it'll just be me and opa.
Nono. The bug must stop. No more sick please.
I hear ya. How are you? How was work?
Good! It's bedtime! And bad! It's work! I tapped my 2 weeks notice to the freezer and walked out. Im done. F part time. Not doing it.
I taped*
O_O Whoaaaaa!
That's.....cray! But I'm proud of you....I think? I love you and support you fully. Did something happen or were you just annoyed?
i@x@ @Haha i didnt like quit and storm out haha. I was peeved yes. But nothing per say happened. Just same ole bs that i dont need to deal with. Place makes me
i@x@ !@ angry the moment i think about it. Sooooo i dont think i need that. Mmmm mmmm nope.
We gots a prollem tho. Im tryin to go to bed here. But i cannot find you.
Hahaha. That's how I felt yesterday!!! I didn't go to bed till close to 1 even though I was in bed by 11. I thought to myself "I bet I'd be able to sleep if Mike were here!"
Diddo. Thats whats going on right now haha! But have a good day, my love. Eat your veggies, feel like a million, keep doing smarty girl things in school. Kiss u
I love you so much!
